name: Magus Over Fool
description: Fly to the sky from the bottom of the world! Become 'The Fool' in the world of tarot cards, and to regain the strength that 'The Magus' and the world have reversed.
minimum_requirements: OS: window 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: window 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 Storage: 500 MB available space
